addr: 300 E. Ocean Blvd. Long Beach, CA CA
title: Long Beach Comic Expo 2016
desc: We welcome attendees dressed in costumes, but do require a strict weapon check before entrance (so don't bring any real weapons with you, even if it's part of your costume). You can reach us at customerservice@longbeachcomiccon.com with any questions. Your registration is transferrable. ?You may change the name on your ticket by entering the site and using your confirmation number to pull up your order.
